root.name: Uncharted: Fight for Fortune
root.description: OverviewUncharted: Fight for Fortune is a downloadable card game spin-off from the Uncharted franchise designed by Sony Bend and developed by One Loop Games for the PlayStation Vita. It lets the player put together a deck of cards based on characters and items from the franchise, and battle through an "8+ hour campaign" alone or against other players with asynchronous online multiplayer.While owning Uncharted: Golden Abyss is not required, doing so will provide benefits to the player's deck based on items found in the game. The game will focus on cards from Golden Abyss and Drake's Fortune, with cards from Among Thieves and Drake's Deception being available as DLC.
